itemInfo.itemDesc:
The byproduct of Alchemy.
- How to Obtain: Randomly obtained after successful Alchemy. 

 
 - Exchange 5: Contribution Points

 
 - Exchange 5: Contribution Points
 (Right-click for detailed exchange location)

item.name: Rough Stone
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered with a Pickaxe from any rock on the ground.

item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Everlasting Herbs require a certain level of skill to collect.
- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered directly from Wild Herbs using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Magic Crystal of Enchantment - Experience
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Helmet sockets.
- Item Effect: Combat EXP +5%
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Essence of Crimson Flame
item.desc: An essence extracted from Fruit of Crimson Flame, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Can be made by combining other ingredients with Fruit of Crimson Flame using Alchemy.

item.name: Magic Crystal of Crimson Flame - Precision
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Weapon sockets. 
- Item Effect: All Accuracy +1
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Clown's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Iron Ore.
